title: Manafort Probed, George Clooney Sucks At Racial Commentary 10.31.17

description:
In episode 17, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Shannon Coffey to discuss Robert Mueller & his charges against Paul Manafort, Kevin Spacey's apology, Larry David's new season of Curb, George Clooney & Suburbicon, Albert Einstein, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
